name: Get Me Out Of Here (CustardCosmos, weakrule, irys)
name_original: Get Me Out Of Here (CustardCosmos, weakrule, irys)
description:
"Get Me Out Of Here" is a student project made during the Basics of Game Development course for the Digital Learning Games program at Tallinn University.

A 2-player game, Get Me Out Of Here  has players take on the role of explorers in the lieu of good ol' Indy Jones. Unfortunately, one player seems to have slipped and fallen deep, deep down into an old trap-laden maze. Lucky for them, their partner seems to have a map to the place! WITH the traps marked! 

Unfortunately, the one with the map has no idea of what their friend's seeing - so the two must verbally communicate to make sure the maze is escaped unscathed. 

Inspired by 'Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes' - Get Me Out Of Here aims to aid in teaching communication.
